class.name: GDScript
class.brief_description: A script implemented in the GDScript programming language.
class.description: A script implemented in the GDScript programming language. The script extends the functionality of all objects that instance it. [method new] creates a new instance of the script. [method Object.set_script] extends an existing object, if that object's class matches one of the script's base classes.

method.name: get_as_byte_code
method.description: Returns byte code for the script source code.

method.name: new
method.description: Returns a new instance of the script. For example: [codeblock] var MyClass = load("myclass.gd") var instance = MyClass.new() assert(instance.get_script() == MyClass) [/codeblock]
